thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 63 of 3060
thread.title: John McCauley

author: John McCauley
title: John McCauley
text: Dealing with all the competition looking for best deal, this experience stands out as the very best. Best price, best terms, and most importantly no mandatory deposit; e.g. Priceline terms for cancellation are onerous on rentals for more than 3 days a 3 day minimum is changed, on several others to get a "reasonable" deal one must prepay in advance to get (somewhat) lowest rate. This company appears to want my business and makes it possible. Looking forward to follow-up after rental experience completed.
